name: VR Battleship YAMATO
description: Full Scale Restoration of the Japanese battleship “Yamato” in VR. Battleship Yamato was constructed during the World War Ⅱ in 1941, and it was the biggest battleship ever built. Unfortunately, Yamato didn’t last through the war, and it sank to the bottom of the sea. Now, battleship Yamato is completely restored in full scale in VR.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1060
